TEXT: If we decide to make any mod settings
The strings should go in here
Count as [E] NL Spent after [E] NL Conserved between turns.
When you draw during your turn, draw from here first.
When you draw during your turn (not at the start of your turn), draw from here first. NL Click to view #yHot cards and others removed this combat.
Cores act as a base for creating new cards.
You have an Evaporated card! Evaporated cards are drawn before cards in your draw pile when you draw during your turn. (But they aren't drawn into your hand at the start of the turn!)
If #yHoliday #yCheer is greater than an enemy's current HP, they go home for the holidays and increase #yChristmas #ySpirit by 1.
Jingle bells, jingle bells, jingle all the way...
Dashing through the snow, in a one horse open sleigh...
All I want for Christmas is youuuuuuu!
Chestnuts roasting on an open fiiiiire...
On the first day of Christmas...
It's beginning to look a lot like Christmas!
Jingle bell, jingle bell, jingle bell rock!
Santa Claus is coming to town!
